api.description: NC News API provides a set of endpoints for interacting with articles, topics, users, and comments.

endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all available topics.
Get a list of all articles, optionally filtered by topic, author, or date range.

query_params.topic: optional - Filter articles by topic slug (e.g., 'football').
query_params.author: optional - Filter articles by author's username.
query_params.sort_by: optional - Sort articles by a specific field (e.g., 'date', 'votes').
query_params.order: optional - Specify the sort order ('asc' or 'desc').
